mapper.select: SELECT aj.id, e.id AS enterpriseId, e.logo, e.name AS enterpriseName, e.scale, p.name AS positionName, j.edu_requirements AS eduRequirements, j.work_experience AS workExperience, j.min_salary AS minSalary, j.max_salary AS maxSalary, dd1.name AS cityName, (SELECT CASE WHEN j.award IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS isAwardExist FROM apply_job AS aj LEFT JOIN job AS j ON aj.job_id = j.id AND j.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN enterprise AS e ON j.enterprise_id = e.id AND e.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN district_data dd1 ON j.city_code = dd1.code AND dd1.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN position AS p ON j.position_code = p.code AND p.is_delete = 0 WHERE aj.applicant = #{userId} AND aj.is_delete = 0 ORDER BY aj.create_time DESC LIMIT #{listDto.pageSize} OFFSET (#{listDto.pageNumber} -1) * #{listDto.pageSize}

SELECT aj.id, aj.recruit_process_instance_id AS recruitProcessInstanceId, e.id AS enterpriseId, e.logo, e.name AS enterpriseName, e.scale, p.name AS positionName, j.edu_requirements AS eduRequirements, j.work_experience AS workExperience, j.min_salary AS minSalary, j.max_salary AS maxSalary, dd1.name AS cityName, (SELECT CASE WHEN j.award IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS isAwardExist, rpi.process_step AS processStep FROM apply_job AS aj LEFT JOIN job AS j ON aj.job_id = j.id AND j.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN enterprise AS e ON j.enterprise_id = e.id AND e.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN district_data dd1 ON j.city_code = dd1.code AND dd1.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN position AS p ON j.position_code = p.code AND p.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN recruit_process_instance AS rpi ON aj.recruit_process_instance_id = rpi.id AND rpi.is_delete = 0 WHERE aj.id = #{id} AND aj.is_delete = 0

SELECT u.id FROM apply_job AS aj LEFT JOIN job AS j ON aj.job_id = j.id AND j.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN yy_user AS u ON j.uid = u.id AND u.is_delete = 0 WHERE aj.recruit_process_instance_id = #{instanceId} AND aj.is_delete = 0
SELECT applicant FROM apply_job WHERE recruit_process_instance_id = #{instanceId} AND is_delete = 0
